price: Guyyaa san lallabaa jallinni isaaf hinjirre hordofu; Sagaleewwan Rahmaaniif cal jetti, Shokomsaa malee homaa hin dhageessu.
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلدَّاعِيَ لَا عِوَجَ لَهُۥۖ وَخَشَعَتِ ٱلۡأَصۡوَاتُ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ فَلَا تَسۡمَعُ إِلَّا هَمۡسٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin yattabiʿūna al-dāʿiya lā ʿiwaja lahu wakhashaʿati al-aṣwātu lilrraḥmāni falā tasmaʿu illā hamsan
